posts.post_content:
Looking for a PSA 3 or 4 with good centering and great eye appeal. I have seen all the ones on eBay already(everything but eBay please). Prefer SC back as those tend to have the nice richer green which is what I'm looking for. 
If you help me secure one (which means buy the one you pointed me to) I will give you $100 finders fee :D
[url]rubenb777@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you

Card found and reward paid :D
Thank you Sam
Wow, that was fast!  Wish all my quests were like that!

[quote name="Scocs" post=1496506]Wow, that was fast!  Wish all my quests were like that![/QUOTE]

Ruben lives a charmed life. :D

I'll say, less than 24 hours, not bad.  My search lasted considerably longer, although I was not actively looking the whole time.

Yes, it was rather fast :D
Guess i got lucky this time. Trust me, i've had so many wanted ads and not even a single reply lol
did you get a psa 3 or a 4
